reference.title: Viewing the properties of a document

section.p:
The main properties of a document are:
The to be used for the translation of the document. Source language The language of the original document. Target language The language of the translated document. Editor The editor associated with the document. Markup table The markup table associated to the document. The markup table is used during analysis and translation of the document.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The document must be in a folder.
